original_text: Then he measured another 500 metres along the stream. He took me through the water again. Here, the water was as high as my knees. He measured another 500 metres. He took me through the water and it was now as high as my belt.
korean_text: 다시 천 척을 측량하고 내게 물을 건너게 하시니 물이 무릎에 오르고 다시 천 척을 측량하고 내게 물을 건너게 하시니 물이 허리에 오르고

sentences.original_text: He took me through the water again
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 다시 물을 통해 데려갔다

sentences.original_text: Here, the water was as high as my knees
He took me through the water
and it was now as high as my belt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 물은 이제 내 허리띠까지 높아졌다
